result.arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ فَمُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمُسۡتَوۡدَعٞۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَفۡقَهُونَ
result.translation: Inni (Rabbiin) Isa lubbuu takka irraa isin uumeedha. Bakka ragga'iinsaa (gadaamessaa)fi bakka qubsumaa (dugdatu isiniif jira). Dhugumatti, Nuti namoota hubataniif keeyyattoota addeessineerra.
